title: All-Party Parliamentary Group on the UK Fresh Produce Network
purpose: To create a forum for Parliamentarians to address critical issues within the agrifood industry, particularly the fresh produce sector, and to advocate for policies that promote sustainable and innovative practices within the sector and supply chain.

contact_details.registered_contact_address: House of Commons, London, SW1A 0AA. Tel: 020 7219 1389.
contact_details.public_enquiry_point_name: Tammy Doughty, UK Fresh Produce Network. Tel: 07462 576 751
contact_details.secretariat: UK Fresh Produce Network acts as the group's secretariat. https://www.lincs-chamber.co.uk/membership/uk-fpn-reasons/
